Name: Default
SourceDescription: Default set of plug-ins supported by PKHeX.Web

PlugIns.Name: Auto-legality mode
PlugIns.Description: Best effort to make your pokemon legal when editing them.
PlugIns.Summary: A proxy for the auto legality mode hosted at: https://github.com/santacrab2/PKHeX-Plugins

PlugIns.Name: Nuzlocking Helper
PlugIns.Description: This adds functionality that helps on Nuzlocking.

PlugIns.Name: Live Run (Browser Emulator)
PlugIns.Description: Allows to use the save file in an emulator in the browser. This is still in preview and may contain several bugs.
